snippet.title: Chillin' with ... Cal Clutterbuck
snippet.description: What's on your iPod now? "I'm kind of a country music guy, but lately it's been R&B stuff like Rihanna and Chris Brown." What are your favorite web-sites? "The three web sites I go to often are Facebook, Hotmail and Wild.com." Who would play you in a movie about your life? "Colin Farrell." Do you eat in, order in or go out? "I either order out or go out. I enjoy steak." Favorite TV...
